messages.title: Joe will fight a Hard Brexit
messages.content: Diane Abbott and the Labour Party voted with UKIP and the Tories to trigger Article 50 and start the process of leaving the EU. Labour won't stand up for Hackney on Europe.

messages.title: Lib Dems will protect our NHS
messages.content: Lib Dems have published a plan to protect and fund the National Health Service, starting with an extra 1p on Income Tax. Labour always talk about the NHS, but only Lib Dems will act.

messages.title: We will tackle the housing crisis
messages.content: Joe supports Lib Dem plans to build 300,000 new homes every year. Hackney Labour has failed to stand up to developers and insist they build enough social and affordable homes here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Joe will oppose a hard Brexit. He criticizes Labour for not standing up for Hackney on Europe.
Lib Dems propose to protect and fund the National Health Service with an extra 1p on Income Tax.
The plan includes building 300,000 new homes per year to address social and affordable housing needs.

issues.brexitEurope: Joe criticizes Labour for voting with UKIP and the Tories to trigger Article 50, indicating he stands against a hard Brexit and believes in standing up for Hackney on Europe.
issues.health: Lib Dems have published a plan to fund the NHS, implying that Labour only talks about it without action.

housing.content: Lib Dems aim to tackle the housing crisis by building 300,000 new homes every year.
